about_the_game:
IT'S THE YEAR 2272. A powerful solar flare scorched Earth and destroyed cities all around leaving the planet to ruins and scattered survivors.
The Dustlands are what's left – a ramshackle collection of pirates, ghost towns and seven settlements.

Survive and thrive in a post-apocalyptic future — resources are scarce, but opportunity calls. Run for resources, find other survivors and discover secrets of the Dustland. Your mission is to race over the Dustlands and save the future.

THE END IS JUST THE BEGINNING!



RIDE

 Workout physically to get rewards. The more missions you complete, the more rewards you get.

BADGES

 Earn badges based on distance not performance.

UPGRADE

 Using items and resources collected to upgrade your character. Improve your stats and tackle more dangerous missions offering greater rewards.
detailed_description:
REQUIRES HARDARE

This game requires a fitness controller to play. Please visit our website for more information on supported hardware.


NO CRYPTO

You cannot earn NFT's or tokens in this version of DUSTLAND. Our Steam version does not require a wallet to connect and play missions. This version will allow you to access updates and mission packs through in app purchases.


About the Game

IT'S THE YEAR 2272. A powerful solar flare scorched Earth and destroyed cities all around leaving the planet to ruins and scattered survivors.
The Dustlands are what's left – a ramshackle collection of pirates, ghost towns and seven settlements.

Survive and thrive in a post-apocalyptic future — resources are scarce, but opportunity calls. Run for resources, find other survivors and discover secrets of the Dustland. Your mission is to race over the Dustlands and save the future.

THE END IS JUST THE BEGINNING!



RIDE

 Workout physically to get rewards. The more missions you complete, the more rewards you get.

BADGES

 Earn badges based on distance not performance.

UPGRADE

 Using items and resources collected to upgrade your character. Improve your stats and tackle more dangerous missions offering greater rewards.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce series 9 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Stereo Sound
  • Additional Notes: Bluetooth or ANT+ Wireless connectivity to a Exercise bike or a bike with speed sensor.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce series 9 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Stereo Sound
  • Additional Notes: Bluetooth or ANT+ Wireless connectivity to a Exercise bike or a bike with speed sensor.

name: Dustland Rider

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce series 9 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Stereo Sound
  • Additional Notes: Bluetooth or ANT+ Wireless connectivity to a Exercise bike or a bike with speed sensor.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce series 9 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Stereo Sound
  • Additional Notes: Bluetooth or ANT+ Wireless connectivity to a Exercise bike or a bike with speed sensor.

short_description: IT'S THE YEAR 2272. A powerful solar flare scorched Earth and destroyed cities all around leaving the planet to ruins and scattered survivors. The Dustlands are what's left – pirates, ghost towns and the seven settlements. Survive & thrive in a post-apocalyptic future - opportunity calls!
